Activity: Wake up, blast some upbeat music to get pumped for the day! Log into the EHR and check for any urgent messages.
Review patient schedules and prioritize assessments based on appointment times and patient needs.
Patient assessment and EHR entry. Start with a warm greeting and build rapport.
More patient assessments and EHR data entry. Maintain a high level of accuracy and attention to detail.
Take a short break for a walk around the department, stretch and get some fresh air.
Continue patient assessments and EHR documentation. Provide clear and concise instructions to patients regarding follow-up care.
Patient assessment and accurate EHR entry. Making sure to document everything.
If all tasks are done, start browsing social media to see if there are any interesting news. If not, browse some videos related to nursing techniques.
Lunch! Grab a tasty lunch and chat with coworkers about the day. Sharing is caring!
Patient assessment and EHR entry. Be kind and patient.
Patient assessment and EHR documentation. Make sure the data is correct.
Another round of patient interactions. Making sure I am being friendly!
Enter the data into the EHR.
Reflect on the day's patient interactions and identify any learning opportunities. Think about how to improve the patient experience.
Review EHR data and look for missing data.
Prepare and organize stuff for tomorrow.
Time to head home. Maybe stop for ice cream on the way!
